sentence.Network_en: There is no safety in unlimited technological hubris.
sentence.Network_cn: 在技术方面自以为是会很危险.

sentence.Network_en: The very hubris of French claims alarmed the other powers.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国贪婪的胃口使其他大国惊恐不安.

sentence.Network_en: But the gods are offended by hubris.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,极度的高傲自信开罪了神灵.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一种过度自信是指人们存在傲慢(Hubris) 心态;另外一种过度自信则指的是人们对于某种事情的判断过于肯定了(Alpert and Raiffa ,1959.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... debris 废墟，残骸 hubris 过份自傲，目中无人 verdigris 铜锈，铜绿.
过去活力充沛的文化通常难免流于骄傲的自欺，希腊人对此有一词形容：狂妄（hubris），今天我们仍然在用它。因为文化是一个整体…
蓝宝词典 ... hub n. 车轴，中心 hubris n. 狂妄自大 humble adj. 卑下的,谦逊的,粗陋的.

list.abs: but as oil prices fell and russia' s economy started contracting , this hubris became harder to maintain .但是，当石油价格下滑，俄罗斯经济开始收缩时，这种自满情绪就很难维系了。
the very hubris of French claims alarmed the other powers .法国贪婪的胃口使其他大国惊恐不安。
But generations change , power often creates hubris and appetites sometimes grow with eating ., 但随着世代更替 , 实力往往滋生狂妄 , 胃口有时会越吃越大.
In 2010 those memories of European hubris will seem cruelly distant ., 2010年 , 那些对欧洲傲慢的记忆将变得十分遥远渺茫.

entry.def: If you accuse someone of hubris, you are accusing them of arrogant pride.

example.ex: ...a tale of how an honourable man pursuing honourable goals was afflicted with hubris and led his nation towards catastrophe.
example.tran: 关于一个追求崇高目标的磊落君子是如何因自高自大而将自己的国家引向灾难的故事

auth_sentence.content: I sincerely hope that no one displays such hubris.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I sincerely hope that no one displays such hubris.

auth_sentence.content: To try is hubris, folly and justifies more predation.
auth_sentence.res_content: To try is hubris, folly and justifies more predation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To try is hubris, folly and justifies more predation.

auth_sentence.content: I believe hubris was actually a crime in ancient Greece.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I believe hubris was actually a crime in ancient Greece.
